attributes.action: Remove MPs From Office If they do wrong
attributes.additional_details:
A Member of Parliament is a public employee, i.e. they work for the public and are paid from public taxes.
If an MP goes against the wishes of the people and the advice of experts in various fields, as in the case of the chancellor as in his recent budget, failing to heed the advice of financial experts, then following that up with comments reported in the press that can only be described as insulting to the general public, we, the general public should have the right as their employer to demand that they are removed from office.
